about_the_game:
ABOUT THE DEMO

This Demo includes a fraction of La Salamanca's first level, the Apartment Complex, where you will find a VHS Tape that one of your friends left for you.

While the game is still in active development, we decided to release a short demo of a fraction of the first level, with the intent of gathering feedback to make the game even better when it releases.

ABOUT LA SALAMANCA

In "La Salamanca", you put yourself in the shoes of a young man from Argentina, who after the mysterious disappearance of all his friends during a trip to Santiago del Estero, will have to look for them in their supposed meeting place: An old and dark apartment complex called "El Portal", a "cozy" place, which is not what it seems...

Inspired by a local urban legend from Argentina, you will have to go deeper and deeper into this hell of a place, to finally reveal the truth of what happened with your colleagues, and what this site is trully hiding.

MADE IN ARGENTINA

We are Carpincho Studio, a bunch of young amateur devs from Argentina (Mostly from Rosario). We love games and both playing and developing them is our passion, reason why we decided, as a group, to finally make public our first ever game, "La Salamanca".

We also love Capybaras. Best animal ever.

content_descriptors.notes: "La Salamanca" may containt content not apropiate for all ages, containing Frequent Violence or Gore, Strong Horror Themes, Strong Language, and General Mature Content.
